articles.title: Active-duty Boston police officer dies after more than 30 years with department, BPD says
articles.description:
Officer Scott MacIsaac has died after a battle with cancer, the organizer of a Gofundme wrote.

The post Active-duty Boston police officer dies after more than 30 years with department, BPD says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Officer Scott MacIsaac, a Boston police officer, died after a battle with cancer.
He served over 30 years with the Boston Police Department.
His passing impacts the local community and police department morale.
